org.kohsuke.args4j

Class Args4JTestBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.kohsuke.args4j.Args4JTestBase<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AliasedTest, AtOptionTest, CustomExceptionTest, DependencyOptionsTest, EnumArgumentTest, EnumAttributeTest, ExplicitBooleanArgumentTest, ExplicitBooleanOptionTest, ExternalConfiguredTest, HelpOptionTest, HiddenOptionTest, InheritanceTest, KeyValueTest, LongUsageTest, MultivaluedTest, NativeTypesTest, PrintUsageTest, PropsTest, SetterTest, SimpleStringTest, StopOptionTest, StringWithMetavarTest, SubCommandTest

    public abstract class Args4JTestBase<T>
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    Base class for Args4J Tests. It instantiates the test object, the CmdLineParser for that test object and provides a String array for passing to the parser.
    Author:
    Jan Materne
